meanings.sent1: She was elated when she received an A on her test.
meanings.sent2: The team was elated after winning the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The elated puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in full bloom looked elated under the bright sun.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter filled the room with an elated atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The surprise party elated her beyond words.
meanings.sent2: His thoughtful gesture elated his grandmother on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The magician's tricks elated the audience, leaving them in awe.
meanings.sent4: The music elated her spirits, lifting her mood instantly.
meanings.sent5: The good news elated him, bringing a smile to his face.
